rows.label: bf03020100_0030
rows.name: I hear the Holy Grail awakened. Nasty shock for you?

rows.label: bf03020100_0040
rows.name:
Of course, my script showed how
everything would play out from the start.

rows.label: bf03020100_0050
rows.name: Sure, you say that once it's all over and done with.

rows.label: bf03020100_0060
rows.name: It's easy to act smug when hindsight's on your side!

rows.label: bf03020100_0105
rows.name:
And my beloved younger sister is
out hunting, as always.

rows.label: bf03020100_0110
rows.name:
I'm sure she'll have found plenty of
Drivers to chew up and spit out by now.

rows.label: bf03020100_0120
rows.name: She likes to hunt, all right.

rows.label: bf03020100_0130
rows.name:
Not sure we can use all of those
Core Crystals though...

rows.label: bf03020100_0140
rows.name: Do we know where the Holy Grail is right now?

rows.label: bf03020100_0160
rows.name: Of course we know her whereabouts!

rows.label: bf03020100_0180
rows.name:
Hm! It seems they're currently traveling
away from the urban area of Gula.

rows.label: bf03020100_0190
rows.name: Leaving the town? But there's nothing out that way...

rows.label: bf03020100_0200
rows.name: Perhaps they're on their way out of Gula itself.

rows.label: bf03020100_0220
rows.name: It seems a certain shipment has set out.

rows.label: bf03020100_0230
rows.name:
The Core Crystals heading to Acedia
for cleansing, huh? How pious of them...

rows.label: bf03020100_0250
rows.name:
I can deal with that myself.
You concentrate on the Holy Grail.

rows.label: bf03020100_0270
rows.name:
Well, I am looking forward to clapping
eyes on the Holy Grail...

rows.label: bf03020100_0286
rows.name: Without a doubt, this is Byakko's wavelength.

rows.label: bf03020100_0288
rows.name: It seems they're traveling together with the Grail.

rows.label: bf03020100_0300
rows.name:
Understood.
You don't need to ask me twice.

rows.label: bf03020100_0310
rows.name: Right then. We're gonna take the Monoceros.
